summary: This is an email chain from January 20, 2021, in which Chris R. Rodgers shares a folder containing documents (depositions, medical records, expert reports, etc.) from a civil matter against Jeffrey Epstein. The email originates from the law firm Searcy Denney Scarola Barnhart & Shipley, P.A., and includes confidentiality notices.

persons.context: Appears as a recipient of the email sharing the Epstein case documents.

persons.context: Appears as a recipient of the email sharing the Epstein case documents.

events.title: Sharing of Epstein civil case documents
events.description: Chris R. Rodgers shares a folder containing documents (depositions, medical records, expert reports, etc.) from a civil matter against Jeffrey Epstein via email.

keyFacts: The email shares a folder containing documents from a civil matter against Jeffrey Epstein, including depositions, medical records, and expert reports.
The communication originates from the law firm Searcy Denney Scarola Barnhart & Shipley, P.A., and is marked as privileged and confidential.
The email indicates that the shared link will work for anyone, suggesting broad distribution of the Epstein case documents.
